titles.title: United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2014
To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish a United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/30/2014--Introduced. United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2014 - Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish within the Department of State an Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.
